synopsis.text: Itou Keita receives a prestigious invitation to attend the elite all-boys high school, Bell Liberty Academy, despite his average grades and lack of any outstanding talents. As Keita arrives at the school, full of the nation's most gifted and privileged students, he wonders why he of all people has been admitted. On his first day, a strange accident draws the attention of Niwa Tetsuya, the charismatic student council president, and Saionji Kaoru, the diligent class secretary. As the eyes of the school's handsome student body fall on Keita, he feels out of place among all these exceptional young men. Eager to discover the reason behind his invitation, Keita tries to find what makes him stand out. He develops complex relationships with his talented classmates and becomes especially intrigued by the friendly yet enigmatic Kazuki Endou. Why did the chairman select an ordinary student like Keita? And will he be able to find his place among the elite?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
